name: Riya Vyas
position: Cybersecurity Analyst | CSSC certified |  Passionate for project Management | Aspiring As project Coordinator
about: I am Certified Project Manager. As an experienced project manager intern, I take pride in providing my stakeholders with a thoughtful approach that involves both facts and empathy. As a people connector at heart, I think that team cooperation is the key to the success of both accompany and a project. I love to contribute both formally and informally to leadership within the team, bringing a passion for coaching and organizing people.

current_company.name: Purdue Global Internship Program (PGIP)
current_company.title: Cybersecurity Analyst | CSSC certified |  Passionate for project Management | Aspiring As project Coordinator

positions.subtitle: Purdue Global Internship Program (PGIP)
positions.description: As a Cybersecurity Analyst intern, I gained valuable hands-on experience in identifying and mitigating security risks within a corporate environment. My responsibilities included analyzing security incidents, conducting vulnerability assessments, and assisting in the implementation of security measures to protect sensitive data and systems. I collaborated with senior analysts to monitor network traffic, investigate potential threats, and develop incident response plans. Through this internship, I honed my technical skills in cybersecurity tools and protocols, enhanced my understanding of risk management strategies, and learned the importance of proactive security measures to safeguard against cyber threats.
positions.title: Cyber Security Analyst intern
positions.description_html: As a Cybersecurity Analyst intern, I gained valuable hands-on experience in identifying and mitigating security risks within a corporate environment. My responsibilities included analyzing security incidents, conducting vulnerability assessments, and assisting in the implementation of security measures to protect sensitive data and systems. I collaborated with senior analysts to monitor network traffic, investigate potential threats, and develop incident response plans. Through this internship, I honed my technical skills in cybersecurity tools and protocols, enhanced my understanding of risk management strategies, and learned the importance of proactive security measures to safeguard against cyber threats.

experience.title: Project Manager Internship
experience.description: During my Project Management internship, I was immersed in various aspects of project planning, execution, and monitoring. I actively contributed to creating project schedules, tracking progress, and coordinating tasks among team members to ensure project milestones were met on time and within budget. I gained practical experience in using project management tools such as Gantt charts and Kanban boards to visualize workflows and manage project timelines effectively. Additionally, I participated in team meetings, facilitated communication channels, and assisted in resolving project-related issues, which deepened my understanding of project management methodologies and the importance of collaboration and organization in successful project delivery.

experience.title: Data Analyst /Machine Learning / Social Behavior
experience.description: Lead the team and analyst how the data is running and what should be next need for social media app features. Develop and implement text analytics techniques to analyze and interpret unstructured data fromvarious sources, including social media, surveys, and customer feedback. Use machine learning algorithms to build predictive models that can forecast customer behavior,sales trends, and other business metrics. Create data visualizations and dashboards to present findings to stakeholders in a clear andconcise manner.

education.title: Harvard Business School Online
education.description: In this introductory course, I have explore strategies for leading in a changing world where adaptive pressures will continue to challenge all of us. I have discover new ways to approach complex organizational systems and take thoughtful action on the work we all face ahead. Most importantly, I have reflect on how to move forward on the leadership challenges you care about most.

projects: [{"title":"Final Pitch Deck","start_date":"Aug 2023","description":"his project-based course is designed to provide you with the resources and tools you need to develop a pitch deck for a start-up, which you will submit as your Capstone Project. Please study the readings below, which provide you with the resources and timeline you need to complete a successful pitch deck. Then, please take the Project Scope Quiz. You must score 100% to pass the quiz, but you have multiple opportunities to retake the quiz until you score 100%. If you're looking for some inspiration, you can learn about how some entrepreneurs got their ideas off the ground. We've also reposted lectures from the courses that will be particularly helpful for you to review."},{"title":"Business Analysis & Process Management","start_date":"Jul 2023","end_date":"Present","description":"Establish a clear identification of your business and list your business needsDefine the term business process, as well as identify the business process stakeholders.Interpret the business process flow across the organization through the effective use of Lucidchart.Create your own business process model on Lucidchart.Break down the current business process model and highlight its main issues.Evaluate your business process with specific regards to your business needs and develop valid solutions to your current business problems"},{"title":"Gender Analytics Capstone Project Submission","description":"1. Quality of Intersectional Analysis2. Clarity of the problem statement3. Compelling evidence from data4. Prototype5. Creativity 6. Impact assessment of the proposed idea7. Implementation barriers8. Action plan"}]
